text: Is there a way to have 5 equal width columns? When I try and create one dragging in modules it adjusts the width of the first two columns to adjust the difference. <https://share.vidyard.com/watch/BmTWpwVU34CKTVqd9SAK52>?
it’s a 12 column grid system. So, you could add 2, 1 column width columns on each end and have 5 in the middle equal width.
otherwise I’d recommend making a custom module for the 5 columns
Warning: shameless self promotion ahead…… or use a module like this great one: <https://marketplace.HubSpot.com/products/kelp-agency/simple-columns>

Thank you Stefan. I was just thinking a non-developer wouldn't understand the 12 column grid limitations and only expect a certain result. Because of this, maybe the default behavior should just work and make the adjustments.
